data.Sentence_cn: 秘书告诉我说哈姆斯沃斯先生要见我。
data.Sentence: The secretary told me that Mr.Harmsworth would see me.

data.Sentence_cn: 我走进他的办公室，感到非常紧张。
data.Sentence: I felt very nervous when I went into his office.

data.Sentence_cn: 我进去的时候，他连头也没抬。
data.Sentence: He did not look up from his desk when I entered.

data.Sentence_cn: 待我坐下后，他说生意非常不景气。
data.Sentence: After I had sat down, he said that business was very bad.

data.Sentence_cn: 他还告诉我，公司支付不起这么庞大的工资开支，有20个人已经离去。
data.Sentence: He told me that the firm could not afford to pay such large salaries. Twenty people had already left.

data.Sentence_cn: 我知道这次该轮到我了。
data.Sentence: I knew that my turn had come.

data.Sentence_cn: “哈姆斯沃斯先生，”我无力地说。
data.Sentence: 'Mr.Harmsworth,' I said in a weak voice.

data.Sentence_cn: 然后他微笑了一下告诉我说，我每年将得到1,000 英镑的额外收入。
data.Sentence: Then he smiled and told me I would receive an extra thousand pounds a year!
